original_title: The Bhoy Who Would Be King - The Official Tribute to Henrik Larsson
overview: A look at the career of former winner of the coveted Golden Shoe Award, Henrik Larsson, and his incredible success with the Hoops. He began playing for the team in 1997 and has officially become one of the greatest Celtic players to date. Also featured is an exclusive interview with the man himself.
tagline: The Bhoy Who Would Be King
title: The Bhoy Who Would Be King - The Official Tribute to Henrik Larsson
